org.gridlab.gridsphere.services.file
Interface FileTaskService

All Superinterfaces:
org.gridlab.gridsphere.portlet.service.PortletService, TaskSubmissionService
All Known Subinterfaces:
FileBrowserService, LogicalFileBrowserService
All Known Implementing Classes:
AbstractFileBrowserService, AbstractFileTaskService, AbstractLogicalFileBrowserService, BaseFileTaskBroker, FileBrowserServiceImpl, LogicalFileBrowserServiceImpl
public interface FileTaskService
extends TaskSubmissionService

Describes a service for performing file tasks.

public java.util.List getFileTaskTypes()
Returns a list of the file task types supported by this service.

createFileTaskSpec

public FileTaskSpec createFileTaskSpec(FileTaskType type)
                                throws FileTaskException
Creates a file task spec of the given file task type. Throws an exception if the given file task type is not supportd by this service.

Returns:
The file task spec
Throws:
FileTaskException

createFileTaskSpec

public FileTaskSpec createFileTaskSpec(FileTaskSpec spec)
                                throws FileTaskException
Creates a file task spec initialized with the values provided in the given file task spec. Throws an exception if the file task type of the given file task spec is not supportd by this service.

Parameters:
spec - The file task spec to copy
Returns:
The new file task spec
Throws:
FileTaskException

submitFileTask

public FileTask submitFileTask(FileTaskSpec spec)
                        throws FileTaskException
Submits the file task described by the given file task spec. Throws an exception if the file task type of given file task spec is not supportd by this service or if an error occurs while submiting the file task.

Parameters:
spec - The file task spec.
Returns:
The file task
Throws:
FileTaskException

cancelFileTask

public void cancelFileTask(FileTask task)
                    throws FileTaskException
Cancels the given file task. Throws an exception if an error occurs while attempting to cancel the file task.

Parameters:
task - The file task to cancel
Throws:
FileTaskException

getFileTasks

public java.util.List getFileTasks(FileTaskType type)
Returns all the file tasks of the given file task type for which records exist . If the file task type is null, returns all file tasks for which records exist.

Parameters:
type - The file task type
Returns:
The list of file tasks
See Also:
FileTask

getFileTasks

public java.util.List getFileTasks(org.gridlab.gridsphere.portlet.User user,
                                   FileTaskType type)
Returns all the file tasks of the given file task type owned by the given user for which records exist. If file task type is null, returns ll file task records associated with the given user.

Parameters:
user - The owner of the file tasks
type - The file task type
Returns:
The list of file tasks
See Also:
FileTask

Returns:
